{"id":1290540463,"question_id":4,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1718575967,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1290540463/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n        int n1 = nums1.size(),n2 = nums2.size(), i=0 , j=0; \n        int n = n1>n2 ? n1:n2 , mn ;\n        vector<int> res ;\n        while(i < n1 && j < n2){\n            if(nums1[i] <= nums2[j]){\n                res.push_back(nums1[i++]);\n            }else {\n                 res.push_back(nums2[j++]);\n            }\n        }\n        if(n1>n2)\n            for(i ; i < n;++i)\n                res.push_back(nums1[i]);\n        else\n            for(j ; j < n;++j)\n                res.push_back(nums2[j]);\n\n        mn = res.size();\n        return mn%2 != 0 ? res[mn/2] : (res[mn/2] + res[(mn/2)-1])/2.0 ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
